definition: once/already/ever (in the past)/former/previously/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)

sentences.english: Translation of Hugo all-roundly and systematically could embody Zengpu's translation standard best.
sentences.chinese: 對雨果的全面系統譯介最好地體現了曾樸的翻譯標準。

sentences.english: But Zengs creation had also inherited Chinese literature tradition.
sentences.chinese: 但是，曾樸的創作又是基於中國文學傳統的。
